properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:47AM PST until February 10 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations from of up to one
inch on the valley floor to one to three inches in the
foothills. Northeast winds increasing to 20 to 35 mph with gusts
to 50 mph.

* WHERE...Antelope Valley. Strongest winds and heaviest snowfall
expected in the foothills.

* WHEN...From noon today to 9 PM PST Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches. Travel on some roadways
may be affected including Highways 14 and 138...especially near
the foothills.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling
1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM PST MONDAY
